meta.title: Renders / Graphic Design
meta.description: Me messing around with Solidworks and Blender.

blocks.title: Overview
blocks.text: I have recently been doing renders and graphical design with Solidworks and Blender. Some of my renders include sticky notes, donuts (which I am particularly proud of), and futuristic cell phones (not shown here). All the source files and some more renders are on Github, so feel free to have a look.
